NK010(tha)039:1: chos dbyings drag po e yi gzhal yas su //
NK010(tha)039:2: rgyal ba kun gyi phrin las gcig bsdus nas //
NK010(tha)039:3: drag po'i skur bzhengs dpal chen he ru ka /
NK010(tha)039:4: bcom ldan rdo rje gzhon nu yab yum dang //
NK010(tha)039:5: bdud 'dul khro bo bcu dang khro mo bcu //
NK010(tha)039:6: za gsod nyi shu sras mchog sgo ma dang //
NK010(tha)039:7: phur skyong srung ma dam can dregs pa'i sde //
NK010(tha)039:8: ma lus 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad la //
NK010(tha)039:9: dam nyams dgra bgegs bsgral ba'i sha khrag rus //
NK010(tha)039:10: lhun por spungs pa'i 'dod dgu'i ba ling ta //
NK010(tha)039:11: dam rdzas bdud rtsi sman dang rak+ta dmar //
NK010(tha)039:12: rgya mtsho lta bur bskyil ba'i mchod tshogs kyis //
NK010(tha)039:13: thugs dam dgyes bskyed gsang ba sngags kyi sgra //
NK010(tha)039:14: 'dzab bsnyen grangs su bsgrang ba'i mchod pa 'bul //
NK010(tha)039:15: che ba'i yon tan mnyam med ye shes sku //
NK010(tha)039:16: thogs med phrin las rdzogs la phyag 'tshal bstod //
NK010(tha)039:17: snyigs dus las nyon drag pos mnar ba bdag /
NK010(tha)039:18: bar chad dgra bgegs 'byung pos 'tshe byed na //
NK010(tha)039:19: re sa skyabs gnas gzhan du ma mchis pas //
NK010(tha)039:20: snying nas lha mchog khyod kyi thugs dam bskul //
NK010(tha)039:21: sngon gyi thugs dam ma g.yel thugs rjes dgongs //
NK010(tha)039:22: dus 'di nyid du ye shes rdo rje yi //
NK010(tha)039:23: byin rlobs dbang skur sgrub pa'i rtags mtshan ston //
NK010(tha)039:24: bar chad dgra bgegs dam sri'i srog lus snying //
NK010(tha)039:25: gzhob rgod rdog pas bardzisa pa ji bzhin du //
NK010(tha)039:26: gso glags med par dmyal thag gcod pa dang //
NK010(tha)039:27: gzhan don lhun grub thugs rjes yang sgrol gyis //
NK010(tha)039:28: srid pa'i dgra sde rtsad nas gcod pa yi //
NK010(tha)039:29: mngon spyod drag po'i phrin las ma lus pa //
NK010(tha)039:30: thogs med da lta nyid du grub pa dang //
NK010(tha)039:31: thal 'byin rnam bzhi'i dgongs pa'i rtsal rdzogs nas //
NK010(tha)039:32: byang chub 'bras bu'i mthar thug 'grub par mdzod //
NK010(tha)039:33: zhes zla bcu gnyis tshes gcig la mi pham pas so //
